references.paper_title: Improved baselines with visual instruction tuning
references.reason: This paper is important because it outlines improvements to visual instruction tuning, a crucial technique used in the ILLUME+ architecture.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is essential because it presents latent diffusion models, which ILLUME+ leverages for high-resolution image synthesis.

references.paper_title: Taming transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper presents a method about the usage of transformers which is used in ILLUME+ to perform high-resolution image synthesis, which makes this reference vital.
This paper is important because it outlines diffusion models, which ILLUME+ leverages to perform the high-resolution image generation.

references.paper_title: Qwen-vl: A frontier large vision-language model with versatile abilities
references.reason: This paper is important because it uses the Qwen2.5 model which is utilized as a base LLM.
